short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Troll in a friendy way ( no permanent damage ! )

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Short on time for an elaborate prank on your unsuspecting friend's laptop? Install this extension quickly and enjoy their confusion.

Rest assured, this extension won't harm or disturb the computer. Once uninstalled, the prank will vanish without a trace.
